graphql.query:
query GetNonOriginatedACHTransfer($id: ID!) {
  node(id: $id) {
    ... on NonOriginatedAchTransfer {
      id
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      failedAt
      processedAt
      returnSentToBankAt
      settlementDate
      amount {
        value
        decimalPlaces
        currencyCode
      }
      sign
      companyEntryDescription
      companyIdentifier
      companyName
      individualIdentificationNumber
      individualName
      paymentRelatedInformation
      purpose
      status
      statusFailureReason
      traceNumber
      type
    }
  }
}

graphql.query:
query GetOriginatedACHTransfer($id: ID!) {
  node(id: $id) {
    ... on OriginatedAchTransfer {
      id
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      failedAt
      processedAt
      effectiveEntryDate
      sentToBankAt
      expectedProcessedAt
      processedAt
      returnProcessedAt
      canceledAt
      amount {
        value
        decimalPlaces
        currencyCode
      }
      sign
      companyEntryDescription
      companyIdentifier
      companyName
      individualIdentificationNumber
      individualName
      paymentRelatedInformation
      purpose
      status
      statusFailureReason
      traceNumber
      type
    }
  }
}
